name: Actualizer
flavor-text: We need to talk about your DPS report.

name: Amigo Sincero
flavor-text: A true friend can penetrate any barrier.

name: Bad Touch
flavor-text: When I'm good, I'm very good…

name: Bane
flavor-text: in Spain, stays mainly on the plain.

name: Bearcat
flavor-text: I love the smell of popcorn in the morning.

name: Bekah
flavor-text: Shoot them in the face. Twice.

name: Boom Puppy
flavor-text: Boom! Boom! Boom! BOOM! BOOOM! GOOD DOGGY!

name: Buffalo
flavor-text: Bison Bison had had had had had Bison Bison Bison shi shi shi.

name: Chulainn

name: Chère-amie
flavor-text: Je suis enchanté. Où est la bibliothéque?

name: Cobra (BL2)
flavor-text: Found out about this, I was like, "DAAAMN, I'm bringing that gun BACK!"

name: Commerce
flavor-text: I have a Soldier, a Siren, two Scooters and a Claptrap.

name: Conference Call
flavor-text: Let's just ping everyone all at once.

name: Dog
flavor-text: Because one barrel ain't enough, and two is too few.

name: Elephant Gun (BL2)
flavor-text: Hated by large numbers of people.

name: Evil Smasher
flavor-text: "Evil will be SMASHED!!! WITH SMASHING!!! EVIL!!! SMASH!!! ER!!!"

name: Fremington's Edge
flavor-text: I can see my house from here.

name: Grog Nozzle
drop-sources: The Beard Makes the Man Quest

name: Hail
flavor-text: What play thing can you offer me today?

name: Hammer Buster
flavor-text: Gar! Gorarr! My dad's a scientist! GWARRRR!!!!

name: Hawk Eye
flavor-text: Eye certain. Finger lightning. Aim death.

name: Heart Breaker
flavor-text: I don't want to set the world on fire…

name: Hector's Paradise
flavor-text: The whip at the New Pandoran's backs.

name: Infection Cleaner
flavor-text: Shhh. I'll take care of everything, don't you fret.

name: Infinity
flavor-text: It's closer than you think! (no it isn't)

name: Interfacer
flavor-text: Because it enters your face. Get it? IT ENTERS YOUR FACE!

name: Jolly Roger
drop-sources: Just Desserts For Desert Deserters Quest

name: Kitten
flavor-text: We're all mad here. I'm mad. You're mad.
drop-sources: Everybody Wants to be Wanted Quest

name: Lady Fist
flavor-text: Love is a Lady Finger. True love is a Lady Fist.

name: Landscaper
drop-sources: Clan War: Zafords vs. Hodunks Quest

name: Little Evie
drop-sources: Mr. Bubbles & Lil' Sis Rare Spawn

name: Longbow
flavor-text: Ceci n'est pas une sniper rifle!

name: M2828 Thumpson
flavor-text: Every soldier has two families: those you raise, and those you raise hell with.

name: Maggie
flavor-text: Monty's wife don't take no guff.

name: Morningstar
flavor-text: a Rose by any other name…

name: Nirvana
flavor-text: Look, life's a bitch. Get over it. Burn something to the ground.

name: Omen
flavor-text: I'm gonna need you to stand back.

name: Orphan Maker
flavor-text: Makes orphans. Often. Curse of the Nefarious Backlash!
drop-sources: Message in a Bottle: Oasis Quest

name: Overcompensator
flavor-text: You can either surf, or you can fight!

name: Patriot
flavor-text: Our voice will not be silenced!

name: Pocket Rocket
flavor-text: Did you ever have the feeling…

name: Pyrophobia
flavor-text: It's actually a fairly rational fear in this case.

name: Rapier
flavor-text: As I end the refrain, thrust home. Curse of the Porcelain Fist!
drop-sources: Message in a Bottle: Hayters Folly Quest

name: Rubi
flavor-text: Whenever I'm caught between two evils, I take the one I've never tried.

name: SWORDSPLOSION
drop-sources: The Sword in The Stoner Quest

name: Scorpio
flavor-text: Say not in grief: "He is not more," but live in thankfulness that he was.

name: Sloth
flavor-text: Yea, booze'll do that to ya…

name: Stalker
flavor-text: You can run, but you can't hide.

name: Stinkpot
flavor-text: We're pirates. We don't follow the rules.

name: Stomper
flavor-text: Oh, sorry, was that your head?

name: Storm
flavor-text: Tut, tut, it looks like rain.

name: Tattler
flavor-text: If thou'st would'st snitch'st, acquire thine stich!

name: Teapot
flavor-text: Havin' a tea partay, drinkin' mah teeea!
drop-sources: You Are Cordially Invited: Tea Party Quest

name: Teeth of Terramorphous
flavor-text: His teeth made them flee in shame…

name: Thunderball Fists
flavor-text: I can have such a thing?

name: Toothpick
flavor-text: A simple solution to a dire problem.

name: Triquetra
drop-sources: Clan War: End of the Rainbow Quest

name: Tunguska
flavor-text: It will split the sky in two.

name: Unicornsplosion
flavor-text: A magnificent gift from a dear friend neither forgotten nor forsaken.

name: Unkempt Harold
flavor-text: Did I fire six shots, or only five? Three? Seven. Whatever.

name: Volcano
flavor-text: Pele humbly requests a sacrifice, if it's not too much trouble.

name: Wanderlust
flavor-text: You never know until you go.

name: Yellow Jacket
flavor-text: By the people. For the people.
